Hallo,

I need to achieve the following goal:
First I want to crawl all sit=
es from the domains in the seed file.
So far so good but I also want to get=
 the DNS check for every external link on a crawled site.
I see two possibi=
lites but I dont know how to do it.

First possibility would be to enable D=
NS check when the link is extracted from the source code and identified as =
external. As far as I can see this option is not supported.

Second possibi=
lty would be to to crawl only first site of an external URL so the DNS chec=
k will be made automatically with option "alsoCheckVia" turned on. But how =
can I limit this to only 1 external site?

I hope you can help me with this=
 problem.

Thanks in advance,
Markus
